Who We Are

ANSHIKA YADAV

I am a first year student in Computer Science Engineering specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning at Mody University of Science and Technology. I have skills in Web Designing and am able to work with HTML, CSS and Javascript. I am passionate about sharing my knowledge and creation with others. Thank you for visiting my website and taking the time to learn more about me. I hope to inspire and empower others to pursue their passions and make a positive impact on the world.
